title: Ask Riot how we’ve made Events out of Ranked 3’s

replies.body: as riot about why no big events? how about ask riot why the hell neus siege 2 weeks in a row, where the hell is u.r.f? lol
like i dont even like nexus siege also...
woah! what a reasonable idea!
Y U NO URF RITO. I CRI EVERYTIEM. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

Ikr I was really looking forward for urf this weekend but it is just nexus siege. I reckon there should be urf 2 weeks in a row as well!
Riot doesn't exactly care about OCE either.. So yea. All dreams you have will never happen

ikr it's friggin annoying, we never had dominion up at all when it was still live, they never hold any major events here (except ocean week) and they barely listen to us anymore, not really happy about that :/
Why would they listen, we don't have 'enough' population for them. Which really means 'We don't make enough off you to care' they use flowery words because you're still a customer.

I think that the new direction Riot is heading in with the events is really nice! Personally I didn't like the bilge water event, I feel like it was too much all at once. Also, U.R.F is so fucking boring. Everyone just plays busted champs and steamrolls you if you want to play something fun. I just use it to 1v1 my friends.

Hi Riot, can you please do demo's of how game mode's are to work because this siege mode frustrates me it's a simple defend and attack scenario however people run all over the map don't understand the concept of siege mode it may just be me, just a tick....1. the act or process of surrounding and attacking a fortified place in such a way as to isolate it from help and supplies, for the purpose of lessening the resistance of the defenders and thereby making capture possible.... nope it's not only me so please educate your players on how to play game modes, have the popular people play it whats it called LCS? The majority will follow their instructions , as they do their builds and play-styles, along with recommended build items. lol
where is our normal draft rito
I 100% agree double Nexus Siege?, I think we should have a double URF because we havent seen it around in a while.

yeah how about Swain {{champion:50}} seems like draven {{champion:119}} is getting all the attention with new skins, just because he has a big ego, doesn't mean he can have a billion skins, PLUS barely anyone plays him anyways its just a waste

Draven has a solid play rate of about 10%, even more so in higher Elos. Swain has a play rate of about 2.7%. It makes more sense to give Draven more skins. Although skins aren't made based on popularity to begin with.
